rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {MEC2404, MEC2405} OR (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MEC2430, MEC2480} AND Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MAT2901, MAT2902, MTH2021, MTH2032}))

description: This unit aims to develop a fundamental understanding of the processes by which heat and energy are inter-related and converted and by which heat is transferred. The unit will review major principles of energy conversion and the modes of heat transfer. The basic laws of thermodynamics and the governing equations for heat transfer and thermodynamics will be introduced and subsequently used to solve practical engineering problems involving thermodynamics and heat transfer. The unit will also cover fundamental design principles of power generation systems and heat exchangers.
